skills.title: My Skills

services.title: My Services
services.description: Discover my professional services in development and IT consulting

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Creation of custom, responsive, and modern websites and web applications. Expertise in modern frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte), full-stack development, and API integration. Focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Development
mobileDev.description: Development of native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. Using technologies like React Native and Flutter. Creating intuitive user interfaces, integrating advanced features, and optimizing performance.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Complete expertise in cloud solutions and DevOps practices. Deployment on AWS, Azure or GCP, CI/CD pipeline setup, Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and automation of development and deployment processes.

devops.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
devops.description: Expertise in setting up and managing development and deployment pipelines. Implementation of CI/CD practices, container orchestration, infrastructure as code, and automated testing solutions.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Development of AI-powered solutions and machine learning models. Implementation of predictive analytics, natural language processing, computer vision, and automated decision-making systems.

consulting.title: Consulting & Strategy
consulting.description: Complete strategic support for your digital projects. Needs analysis, technological roadmap definition, process optimization, software architecture consulting, and support in your digital transformation.
